Origins: These photographs of four black bears cavorting on a backyard playset were snapped by a resident of Anchorage, Alaska, in August 2006. She explained the circumstances behind the pictures to us as follows:
Example: [Collected via e-mail, January 2007] Some folks who live on the Hillside area of Anchorage, Alaska, built this playground in their yard last weekend for their 3 and 4 year-old boys. The next morning, the mom woke up to this scene. Variations: An April 2010 variant sited these ursines in Petoskey, Michigan.
Claim: Photographs show four black bears cavorting on a backyard playset in Alaska.
